Thank you for downloading Car Paint Shading package!
This is a shader package for rendering realistic car paint surface.

"Car Paint Shading/Car Paint Opaque" used for opaque car paint surface.
"Car Paint Shading/Car Paint Transparent" used for transparent car paint surface.

Open "Demo.unity" and have fun with the effects.

If you like it, please give it a good review on asset store. Thanks so much !
Any suggestion or improvement you want, please contact qq_d_y@163.com.
We'd like to help more and more unity3d developers.
